00071     enum AssetType { GeometryAsset, NodeAsset, UVSetAsset, ModifierAsset, MaterialAsset, TextureAsset, SceneAsset };
00072 
00073     virtual bool                    modifyAsset() = 0;

00077

00081     virtual DzUri                   getAssetUri() const = 0;

00084     virtual DzSceneAssetFileInfo    getAssetFileInfo() const = 0;
00085     virtual const QObject*          toQObject() const = 0;

00087     virtual DzUri                   getSource() const = 0;
00088     virtual int                     getFallBackOffset()const=0;
